sections.name: Executive Summary
sections.description: Provide a concise overview of the market analysis findings, key trends identified, and main recommendations for strategic positioning.

sections.name: Market Overview
sections.description: Describe the overall market landscape, size, growth rate, and key characteristics. Include relevant market statistics and trends.

sections.name: Industry Trends
sections.description: Analyze current and emerging trends in the industry, technological developments, regulatory changes, and their potential impact on the market.

sections.name: Competitive Landscape
sections.description: Identify key competitors, their market positions, strengths, weaknesses, and competitive strategies. Include market share analysis.

sections.name: Customer Segmentation
sections.description: Analyze target customer segments, their characteristics, needs, behaviors, and preferences. Include demographic and psychographic profiles.

sections.name: Opportunities and Threats
sections.description: Identify market opportunities for growth and expansion, as well as potential threats and challenges that need to be addressed.

sections.name: Strategic Recommendations
sections.description: Provide actionable recommendations for market positioning, product development, marketing strategies, and competitive differentiation.

sections.name: Conclusion
sections.description: Summarize the key findings and emphasize the most critical insights for decision-making and strategic planning.
